en.name: The Boy’s Brigade, Hong Kong
en.description:
The advancement of Christ's Kingdom among young people 
To guide them to know and welcome Christ into their lives 
Let Christ be their Savior and the Lord in their lives 
To lead the young people to behave in Christ's way so that they will develop Christ-like charaters, including habits of Obedience, Reverence, Discipline and Self-respect 
To lead a disciplined life with team spirits 
To provide skills and leadership training so that the boys can discover their talents 
To encourage the boys to serve the society
en.summary: (FY2011)It supports high transparency and sent us the latest audit report for review, which is commendable.  Project expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 61%, 22% and 12% of total expenditure. (FY2010)Rating is unavailable - no disclosure of fund raising cost.  Program income and Government subvention were 2 major sources of income.  Project expense, salaries, and administrative costs were about 30%, 54% and 11% of total expenditure.  No separation between frontline & administrative staffs.  Recorded a surplus and cash in hand can support operation for about 4-5 months. It has more than 9,700 members of its Uniform Group Service.
en.review:
FY2011
The latest audit report was sent to us by the organization which is commendable
The organization support high transparency and willing to share the latest information with the public
No disclosure of fundraising expense and therefore no rating is available 
Project expense, salaries and administrative cost were about 61%, 22% and 12% of total expenditure
Annual report stated the name and roles of paid staff
Estimation of front line staff cost was made by taking average
Low administrative cost representing good control of operation cost 
Recorded a deficit 
Cash in hand can support operation for about 6-7 months 
Cash in hand net current liabilities can only support about 5 months operation 

FY2010
Incorporated on Feb 25, 2009 
Rating is unavailable - no disclosure of fund raising cost 
Major source of fund was programmes & courses income 
Government subvention is the 2nd major source of income 
Project expense, salaries, and administrative costs were about 30%, 54% and 11% of total expenditure 
Salaries of frontline and administrative staffs are not separately shown 
Low administrative cost representing good control of operation cost 
Recorded a surplus 
Cash in hand can support operation for about 5-6 months 
Cash in hand net current liabilities can only support about 3 months operation 
Services include Uniform Group Services (more than 9,700 members), training and development services, and social services at schools.
en.objective: To lead the young people to behave in Christ's way so that they will develop Christ-like charaters, including habits of Obedience, Reverence, Discipline and Self-respect
en.advice:
To state the fund raising cost 
To expand the courses and programmers so as to generate more income 
To put up the services report or statistic on the website so that the public can understand the service better

tc.name: 香港基督少年軍
tc.description: 於青少年人之間，擴展基督的國度：帶領青少年認識基督、接受基督，讓基督成為生命的主。引導青少年人學像基督，其中包括服從、虔誠、紀律及自愛等良好質素。提供紀律生活及團隊精神。提供技能及領袖訓練，培養服務社會精神。
tc.summary: 主動傳來最新的核數報告，並將報告和年報上載網站，支持高透明度。沒有披露籌款成本，致未能評級。主要資金來源是課程收入，其次是政府資助。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約61%，22%和12%。2011年錄得虧損，持有的現金約足夠約6-7個月營運。服務包括制服團隊，已有超過9,700名成員。另外，轄下單位包括臻訓中心及訓練學校，提供領袖潛能、團隊溝通、品格培養等訓練，亦負責挪亞方舟跨越奇園之繩網及歷奇活動。亦提供駐校專業輔導服務，支援青少年及其家庭之社交心理需要。
tc.review:
(FY2011)
機構主動傳來最新一年的核數報告，樂意提高最新的資料給公眾，並支持高透明度，值得讚賞。由於沒有披露籌款成本，仍是未能評級。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約61%，22%和12%。 年報列出員工職位。本站按平均法估算前綫員工的薪酬，並將之撥入項目費用。行政費用低，反映有效控制成本。入不敷支、錄得虧損，持有的現金約足夠6-7個月營運，若扣除應付費用，則只足夠約5個月。

(FY2010)
香港部於2009年2月25日成立，由於沒有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。主要資金來源是課程收入，其次是政府資助。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約30%，54%和11%。員工薪酬未有分別前綫和行政部員工，估計已包括項目前綫職員。行政費用低，反映有效控制成本。量入為出、錄得盈餘，持有的現金約足夠4-5個月營運，若扣除應付費用，則只足夠約3個月。服務包括制服團隊，已有超過9,700名成員。另外，轄下單位包括臻訓中心及訓練學校，提供領袖潛能、團隊溝通、品格培養等訓練，亦負責挪亞方舟跨越奇園之繩網及歷奇活動。亦提供駐校專業輔導服務，支援青少年及其家庭之社交心理需要。
tc.objective: 於青少年之間擴展基督國度，促進服從、虔誠、紀律及自愛等良好行為
tc.advice: 列出籌款成本，並考慮開辦更多課程，提高收入。

en.name: Cyber Senior Network Development Association
en.description:
To promote the usage of information technology age and sharing of network resource among elderly over 45 years old  
Promotes life-long learning, and achieve harmonious society 
The "aging network "  website was launched for many years 
The only website dedicated for the elderly people in Hong Kong 
Self-financed and has won a number of awards in the Hong Kong and Asia Pacific Information Technology Competition
en.summary: Fund-raising efficiency is low. The cost of raising every $100 was about $50. The total fund raising expense was about 5% of total expenditure.Project expense, administrative costs and salaries were about 24%, 12% and 40% of total expenditure. The report did not distinguish the salaries of front line and back office staffs.There was a net loss mainly caused by depreciation. Cash in hand could support operation for 2 months.It had more than 22,000 members and trained more than 20,000 elderly people in past 8 years.
en.review:
Fund-raising efficiency is low (average cost was $50 for raising every $100) 
Fund-raising expenses were 5% of total expenditures 
Other funding sources include funding from Jockey Club, government funding and program income 
Project expenses, administrative costs and staff salaries were about 24%, 12% and 40% of total expenditure 
Report did not distinguish between front and administration staffs, resulting in high proportion of salaries 
Recorded a loss this year, represented in depreciation of assets 
Cash held can support two months of operation 
More than 22,000 online members 
Successfully trained more than 20,000 elderly people in past 8 years
en.objective: To help elderlies go online, and promote IT service to people over age of 45
en.advice:
To actively increase income and proportion of public donations 
Need sound financial management to increase cash flow 
To consider publishing  the plan for the next 1-2 years, and let partner agencies help with publicity 
To consider providing annual or quarterly statistics for service visits and site usage of each servicing unit

tc.name: 長者網絡發展協會
tc.description: 以「扶老上網」為宗旨，致力推動45歲以上的人士善用資訊科技並分享網路資源，推動長者終身學習，達致「老有所為，數碼共融」的和諧社會。推出網站「老有網」多年，是香港唯一建基民間的長者專門網站，自負盈虧，曾經榮獲香港及亞太區資訊科技大賽的「數碼共融」多項獎項。
tc.summary: 籌款效益低，平均每籌$100的成本為$50，但籌款支出只佔總支出5%。項目費用、行政費用和員工薪酬分別佔總支出約24%, 12%和40%，報表未有分辨項目前綫和行政部員工。是年錄得的虧損主要代表資產折舊費用，而持有的現金僅足夠支持兩個月的營運。現時網上會員超過22,000人，8年間成功培訓了超過20,000長者人次。
tc.review: 籌款效益低，平均每籌$100的成本為$50，但籌款支出只佔總支出5%。其它資金來源包括馬會撥款，政府資助及課程收入。項目費用、行政費用和員工薪酬分別佔總支出約24%, 12%和40%，報表未有分辨項目前綫和行政部員工，令員工薪酬偏高。是年錄得的虧損主要代表資產折舊費用，而持有的現金僅足夠支持兩個月的營運。現時網上會員超過22,000人，8年間成功培訓了超過20,000長者人次。
tc.objective: 以「扶老上網」為宗旨，致力推動45歲以上的人士善用資訊科技
tc.advice: 積極開源並提高公眾捐款的比例，需要審慎理財增加現金流。可考慮在網上公佈未來1-2年的計劃，並讓伙伴機構幫助宣傳，讓公眾得知營運狀況和需要。可考慮提供每年甚至每季度各服務單位的服務人次，以及網站的使用統計數據，讓公眾得知機構的營運效益。

en.name: Green Power
en.description:
To promote environmental education 
Set up “Green School Network " and environmental education resource center 
To conduct various surveys and studies, and publish report on a regular basis 
To raise public awareness and understanding of the relationship between environmental issues and quality of life and health.
en.summary: Project income is the main source of income, and sufficient to cover the cost of the project.administrative costs and salaries were about 6% and 32% of total expenditure. Salaries was at a high level.Brief report of activities and projects, without specifying sources of project income and expenditure distribution.2008 payroll was 10% compared to 2007, but there was less than 25% in proportion of MPF contributions , the unknown was mostly part-time or a large proportion in rising rate of salaries.We suggest the charity submit 2009 financial reports as soon as possible, and put a note about the project income sources and the distribution of project expenditures so that the public can understand the operational situation.
en.review:
No ratings due to no disclosure of fund-raising cost 
Project income was the main source of income, unsure if they were contributions or fees 
Second source of income was "Green Power Hike " fund-raising activity  
Project expenses was 61% of total expenditure, does not exceed project income 
Staff salaries was 32% of total expenditure, at high level 
Administrative costs 6% of total expenditures 
Brief report of activities and projects, including butterfly census, river water quality testing, the establishment of the butterfly trail, and two resource centers etc 
No description of income sources and distribution of project expenses 
2008 payroll was 10% more than that of 2007, MPF contributions fell by 25% 
Unsure whether it was due to more part-time staffs or big increase in salaries
en.objective: To promote environmental protection and education
en.advice:
To submit audit report for 2009 indicating source of income and distribution of project expenses 
To list number of employees, and try to raise proportion of project expenses, thereby reducing proportion of staff costs 
To consider listing the number of people served throughout the year

tc.name: 綠色力量
tc.description: 致力推動環境教育，  成立了「綠色學校網絡」和環境教育資源中心，並進行各項調查及研究，定期發表報告，喚醒市民關注和了解各種環境問題與生活質素及健康的關係。
tc.summary: 項目收入是主要收入來源，並足夠支付項目費用。行政費用佔6%，員工薪酬約佔32%，屬很高水平。年報簡單介紹活動和項目，但未說明項目收入來源和支出分佈。2008年的薪金支出較2007年多10%，但強積金供款卻少了25%，未知是多兼職或薪酬有大升幅。建議盡快遞交2009年財務報告，並於年報說明項目收入來源和項目支出的分佈，令公眾了解營運狀況。
tc.review: 審計報告未有註明籌款成本，所以未能給予評級。項目收入是主要收入來源，但未有說明是捐款或收費。第二收入來源是「綠色力量環島行」籌款活動。項目支出佔總支出約61%，但未超過項目收入。員工薪酬約佔總支出32%，屬很高水平。但行政費用只佔總支出6%。年報簡單介紹活動和項目，包括蝴蝶普查、河流水質測試、設立蝴蝶徑、兩個資源中心等，但未有說明項目收入來源和項目支出分佈。2008年的薪金支出較2007年多10%，但強積金供款卻少了25%，未知是多了兼職或是薪酬有大升幅。
tc.objective: 致力推動環境教育
tc.advice: 盡快遞交已審計2009年報告，並在年報說明項目收入來源和項目支出的分佈，令公眾更了解機構的營運狀況。建議列出員工人數，並嘗試提升項目費用佔總支出的比例，降低員工薪酬支出比例。年報除介紹機構的活動和項目，可考慮加入全年的服務人次，令公眾了解機構的接觸面。

en.name: Hong Kong Society for the Aged
en.description:
Providing day caring service, personal consulting, clinic services to elderly; 
Operating 29 service unites including technology centre
en.summary: Major source of income was government subvention ($190million) and fee income ($45million).  Community Chest and Hong Kong Jockey Club also provided funding to the organisation.  Donation contributed less than 25% of total income.  Flag day income was about $1.3million and cost of raising every $100 was about $10.  Fundraising expense on flag day was only about 1% of total expenditure.  Project expense (most staff cost for 29 service units),  staff expense and administrative expense were 73%, 5% and 11% of total expenditure.  It recorded a surplus.  Cash and investment can support operation for 8 months.  Services included escort service, personal care, nursing caring and provision of meals etc.
en.review:
Major source of income was government subvention ($190million) and fee income ($45million)
Community Chest and Hong Kong Jockey Club also provided funding to the organisation
Donation contributed a small portion of total income (less than 25%)
Flag day income was about $1.3million and cost of raising every $100 was about $10
Fundraising expense on flag day was only about 1% of total expenditure
The organisation operates 29 service units 
Major expenditure was staff expense (~$185million)
Breakdown of staff expense was stated in the note of the audit report and about $10million was belong to head office
If grouping the staff cost other than the staff cost of head office under project expense, the total project expense,  staff expense and administrative expense were 73%, 5% and 11% of total expenditure
Recorded a surplus
Cash and investment in hand were about $160million which can support operation for 8 months
Services included escort service, personal care, nursing caring and provision of meals etc.
en.objective: To provide the best and comprehensive services to elderly
en.advice:
To consider stating the proportion of project and administrative staffs
To consider making the audit report available to the public

tc.name: 香港耆康老人福利會
tc.description: 致力使安老服務臻於完善，提供各種日間護理、個人輔導、家務助理及康樂文娛活動等給長者
tc.summary: 主要收入來源是政府撥款(~1.9億元) 和服務收費(~4,500萬)，另有公益金和馬會的撥款。平均每籌$100的成本約$10，而賣旗籌款費用佔總支出不足1%主要支出屬員工薪酬(~$1.85億元)。若將屬于服務單位的員工薪酬支出撥入項目費用，即項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約73%，5%和11%。錄得盈餘，持有的現金和投資約$1.6億元，足夠支持約8個月營運。服務包括護送、個人照顧、送膳、護理等。
tc.review: 主要收入來源是政府撥款(~1.9億元) 和服務收費(~4,500萬)，另有公益金和馬會的撥款。捐款佔總收入不足25%。賣旗日籌得約$130萬元，平均每籌$100的成本約$10，而賣旗籌款費用佔總支出不足1%。機構營運29個服務單位，主要支出屬員工薪酬(~$1.85億元)。核數報告顯示，當中只有約$1,000萬元屬總服務處員工，其餘皆為服務單位和項目基金的員工薪酬支出。若將該筆員工薪酬的支出撥入項目費用，即項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約73%，5%和11%。錄得盈餘，持有的現金和投資約$1.6億元，足夠支持約8個月。服務包括護送、個人照顧、送膳、護理等，服務量約30萬次，另有長青網和健腦網等。
tc.objective: 致力使安老服務臻於完善
tc.advice: 可考慮列出項目員工和支援/行政部員工的比例，並公開核數報告

en.name: Association of Salesian Cooperators
en.description:
To raise fund for service fund, and serve the youth 
Supported by catholic organization

Cash in hand was about $740,000 which can support operation for 24 months.  No service statistics is available.

Good control of operating expense

en.advice: To consider expanding the services and building a website so that the public will understand the operation better

tc.name: 聖鮑思高慈幼協進會
tc.description: 天主教背景的團體，為服務基金籌款，並服務青少年
tc.summary: 機構規模小，但籌款效益高，平均每籌$100的成本不足$2。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約89%, 1%和8%，顯示有效控制營運成本。錄得盈餘，持有的現金約$74萬，足夠營運24個月。
tc.review: 機構規模小，全年收入和支出僅約$56萬和$37萬。主要收入來源是服務基金收入。籌款效益高，平均每籌$100的成本不足$2。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約89%, 1%和8%，顯示有效控制營運成本。錄得盈餘，持有的現金約$74萬，足夠營運24個月。
tc.objective: 為服務基金籌款，並服務青少年
tc.advice: 可考慮擴張服務並建立網頁或Facebook Page，讓公眾了解營運狀況

en.name: Hong Kong Children’s Musical Theatre
en.description:
To provide performing arts training to children and teenagers aged 2 to 18
Courses emphasizing on the mixture of performing elements such as theatrical acting, vocal singing and choreography
To organize and produce a series of musical performance, school tours and educational seminars for the public
Through artistic experiences, children can be engaged in discovering themselves, connecting with others and making a more meaningful life and a better world
en.summary: The latest audit report submitted to the company registry was financial ended 2009.  Audit report for the year end of 2010 and 2011 are not available yet.  Programme and courses income were the major source of income.  Donation contributed less than 1% of total income.  It is self sustainable by providing programmes.  Project expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 53%, 18% and 26% of total expenditure.  Cash in hands were about $880,000 which can support operation for 2-3 months.  Estimated number of children joining the program was about 230 and there were 16 performances.
en.review:
The latest audit report submitted to the company registry was financial ended 2009 
Audit report for the year end of 2010 and 2011 are not available yet
Programme and courses income were the major source of income
Donation contributed less than 1% of total income
No fund raising event and no estimation of fundraising efficiency can be made, and therefore no rating is available
Self sustainable by providing programmes
Project expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 53%, 18% and 26% of total expenditure
Project expense was mainly production cost
Half of the administrative expense was rental payment
No detailed breakdown of administrative expense was provided
Cash in hands were about $880,000 which can support operation for 2-3 months

en.advice:
To consider stating the breakdown of administrative expense 
To consider stating the number of members and interview the children for their learning in the program

tc.name: 香港兒童音樂劇團
tc.description: 首個提供專業兒童演藝培訓的兒童音樂劇團。以劇場教育和兒童心理為基礎。致力為2-18歲的兒童及青少年提供優質及多元化的演藝培訓，包括戲劇、舞蹈、歌唱以至混合媒體的訓練活動和舞台演出，讓孩子體驗多元化的藝術經驗，培育他們成為更自信、富創意、懂溝通及具合作精神的下一代，締造更具意義及美好的將來。
tc.summary: 核數報告截至2009年，未有2010和2011年的最新財務數據。課程收入是主要收入來源，約$480萬。捐款只佔總收入不足1%。營運狀況自給自足，錄得約$80萬盈餘。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約53%、18%和26%。持有的現金約$88萬元，足夠約2-3個月營運。估算約230多名兒童參加，是年共有16次大小規模的演出。

en.name: UNICEF - Hong Kong Committee for UNICEF
en.description:
The United Nations is committed to safeguarding children's rights organizations 
Works with other United Nations organizations, governments and NGOs to ensure that children enjoy survival, development, participation and protection of rights 
Awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1965, in recognition for their work on child welfare 
Hong Kong Committee arouses public care and concern about the rights of children all over the world through various activities  
To organize activities for young people, encouraging them to participate in volunteer services 
To implement health care, education, child protection, prevention of AIDS and long-term services in 190 countr 
To provide emergency relief work.
en.summary: Effective fund-raising strategies.Since most of the donations raised would be transferred to the New York headquarter, we cannot assess the capital level and not able to rate the charity.According to the annual report of the headquarters, about 90% of donation was used in front-line services.We recommend a timely update of Hong Kong website, and indicate the frequency and amount of annual remittances to the headquarters, so that the public would know how the charity spend the donation.
en.review:
Effective fund-raising (cost of raising every $100 was $7) 
Hong Kong Joint Committee is mainly fund-raising base, most of the contributions were transferred to New York for front-line projects 
Unable to give independent rating for Hong Kong Joint Committee 
According to the headquarters of the annual report, more than 90% of the donation were used as front-line charitable projects 
Deducting the amount needed to be transferred to the headquarters, organisation has about HK $ 40 million in cash and investments, sufficient for the next 12 years of operation.
en.objective: To safeguard children's rights. Hong Kong branch is a fund raising branch.
en.advice:
To share ways of fund-raising with charitable organizations to help them improve fund-raising efficiency 
To reveal the amount of remittances to New York, let public know if contributions has been idle 
To update financial data website (currently still 2008 data).

tc.name: 聯合國兒童基金香港委員會
tc.description: 致力維護兒童權益的聯合國組織，與其他聯合國組織、各國政府及非政府機構攜手工作，確保兒童享生存、發展、參與及受保護之權利。於1965年，獲頒發諾貝爾和平獎，以肯定和表揚其謀求兒童福利上的工作。香港委員會透過不同的活動，喚起各界人士對兒童權利的關注，關心世界世界不同角落的兒童。同時為青少年舉辦活動，鼓勵他們參與義工服務。在全球190國家地區內推行包括醫療保健、教育、保護兒童、預防愛滋病等範疇的長期服務項目，以及提供緊急救援工作。
tc.summary: 香港聯合委員會的籌款效益高。可是，由於大部份捐款會轉至紐約的總部，本站未能為其營運效率和資金需求作出獨立評級。根據總部的年報，約90%捐款用於前綫服務。建議更新香港網站的數據，並說明每年匯款至總部的次數，讓公眾了解捐款有否被閒置。
tc.review: 籌款效益高，每HK$100的籌款成本約HK$7。由於香港聯合委員會主要是籌款基地，大部份捐款轉往紐約總部作前綫項目支出，所以未能為香港聯合委員會作出獨立評級。根據總部的年報，超過90%的捐款用作前綫慈善項目。關於香港聯合委員會對捐款的處理，扣除需要轉往總部的款項，約有HK$4000萬現金和投資，可供未來12年營運。
tc.objective: 致力維護兒童權益的聯合國組織，香港部為其中一個募款基地
tc.advice: 與其它慈善機構分享籌款之道，協助他們提升並籌款效益。另外，建議向公眾交代每年匯款至紐約總部的次數，讓市民了解捐款有否被閒置，並更新網站的財務數據(現時仍為2008年的數據)。

en.name: Suicide Prevention Services
en.description:
To provide suicide prevention services for those  having suicidal tendencies, despair and emotional distress 
Through patience, companionship, caring and non-critical attitude, help the affected feel understood and accepted 
Provide services including 24-hour suicide prevention hotline, outreach services to elderly suicide prevention, and community education.
en.summary: Salaries was about 69% of total expenditure.Even though it showed no clear proportion of frontline and back office staffs salaries, we guess about 66% of staffs were frontline staffs according to the positions and numbers listed on the annual report.Therefore, the estimated project expense would be about 60% of the total expenditure. Salaries and administrative costs were about 23% and 11% of total expenditure.It had more than 350 volunteers. They handled more than 40,000 calls throughout the year. In average, $140 could help a suicidal person.It recorded suplus amounted to 20% of income for the year. Cash in hand can support operation for 14 months.
en.review:
No rating is available - no disclosure in fund-raising costs 
Project expenditure, administrative costs and salaries were only about 14%, 11% and 69% of the total expenditures. 
Audit report did not distinguish between front-line and administrative staff 
Site listed the number of staff positions and estimated 2 / 3 were front-line staff  
Project would cost 60% of total expenditure, staff salaries and administrative costs would be at a reasonable level 
There are more than 350 volunteers in Institutions 
More than 40,000 calls handle per year 
Average of $ 140 would be able to deal with a call from a person with suicidal intentions 
Reports detailing the call statistics, including disturbed problem category, age group, etc..  These statistic will help research and formulate ways to prevent suicide. 
Recorded 20% of surplus 
Cash in hand can support approximately 14 months of operations  
Some of the cash can be used for low-risk investment to fight inflation

tc.name: 生命熱線
tc.description: 向有自殺傾向、感到絕望及有情緒困擾的人士提供益友及其他預防自殺服務，以耐心聆聽、陪伴、關懷及不批判態度，讓他們感到被瞭解和接受，並抒發困擾，藉此紓緩情緒，積極面對人生。服務包括24小時預防自殺熱線、外展預防長者自殺服務、自殺者親友支援計劃、和社區教育。
tc.summary: 員工薪酬佔總支出69%。雖然未有分辨前綫員工和行政部員工薪醜，但網站列出崗位和人數，估計約2/3是前綫員工。若以此計算，項目費用便佔60%，員工薪酬和行政費用為23%和11%。擁有超過350名義工，全年處理超過40,000個來電，平均$140 便能幫助一名有自殺念頭的人。是年有20%盈餘，持有的現金足夠14個月營運。
tc.review: 由於未有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。項目支出只佔總支出約14%，行政費用佔約11%、員工薪酬約佔69%。審計報告未有分辨項目前綫員工和行政部員工，但網站列出職員的崗位和人數，估計約2/3 的員工前綫員工。若以此計算，項目費用便會佔總支出60%，員工薪酬和行政費用都是合理水平。機構有超過350名義工，全年處理的來電超過40,000個，平均$140 便能幫助處理一通有自殺念頭的人的來電。另外，年報詳列來電的各項統計，包括受困擾問題類別、年齡組別等等，相信有助研究和定立方針防止自殺。是年有20%盈餘，而持有的現金約足夠14個月營運，建議將部分現金作低風險投資以抗通脹。
tc.objective: 向有自殺傾向及有情緒困擾的人提供預防自殺服務，使他們情緒得以紓緩，積極面對人生。
tc.advice: 與其它機構分享招募和培訓義工心得，並同時擴闊義工網絡。披露籌款成本，並將前綫人員和行政部員工的薪酬分開顯示，讓公眾了解機構的籌款效益和項目前綫員工的支出。

en.review:
Incorporated in 1994 with offices in 7 countries 
Hong Kong Office was set up in December 2008 
Audit report stated the financial for the period from December 8, 2008 to December 31, 2009 
Income and expense of General Fund and Ministry Fund were clearly stated on the audit report
Major source of income was donation
Even though the income and expense of Walkathon were the same, and the report did not show the donation income for ministry fund, we estimate the fund raising efficiency by the overall income and general fund expense as Hong Kong is a fund raising branch
Estimated fund raising efficiency is high and the cost of raising every $100 was about $9
Fund raising event expense (walkathon) was less than 2% of total expenditure
Project expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 78%, 3% and 12% of total expenditure
Salaries and administrative expense only took a small % of total expenditure
Administrative expense included $66,500 consultancy fee which seems like an one-off expense
Recurring administrative expense was about $5% of total expenditure only
Reflecting an effective cost control
Recorded a surplus 
Cash in hand can support about 2 years of operation, however, the organization is expanding its service and building more schools and home so as to help children in need, according to its annual report
Services include physical care, medical intervention including HIV/AIDS treatment, education – formal and technical, trauma counselling and spiritual discipleship

tc.review: 創立於1994年，於全球7個國家有分部。香港部於2008年底成立，核數報告顯示截至2009年12月31日的賬目。賬目清晰地將營運基金和使命基金的收支狀況分別顯示。主要收入來源是捐款。雖然報告顯示「步行籌款」的收入和支出同樣是$15,000，而使命基金未有列出從該活動收到的捐款，而未能計算步行籌款活動的效益，但，香港屬籌款基地，若以整體的收入和營運支出估算，則每籌$100的成本為$9。此外，其他各指標都顯示營運效率高。籌款活動的支出佔總支出不足2%。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出78%，3%和12%。員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出的比例低，顯示有效控制成本。行政費當中包含一筆$66,500的顧問費，估計這並非經常性費用，或與新成立公司的費用有關。若只計算經常性開支，則行政費只佔總支出約5%。錄得盈餘，雖然持有的現金約足夠兩年的支出，但年報顯示機構正擴張服務，會興建更多學校、宿舍等幫助更多兒童。在非洲烏干達服務包括創傷治療、愛滋病治療等，有創傷性復康中心，建立兒童村，有小學和中學，學生超過3,500人。另有嬰兒褓育中心，並照顧婦女的需要，全年參與的婦女約2,100人。亦設有領袖培訓學院和義工計劃。網站的最新消息更新頻繁，讓公眾了解最新狀況，值得讚賞。

en.name: City Heroes
en.description:
First photo exhibition with the theme of 'City Heroes' in Hong Kong
To inspire and impart to all those who visit the show the spirit of determination, the will to succeed and the depth of generosity
It emphasized that the real heroes of Hong Kong are not the rich and famous, but the everyman of society  Leong Ka Tai is an award winning professional photographer and has published numerous books in Asia and Europe and has exhibited his work in Denmark, the US, and Singapore.
en.summary: It was the first and unique photo exhibition with the theme of 'City Heroes' in Hong Kong in 2003.  In 2010, it had no donation or other income.  Total expenditure was about $8,000 that was minimum administrative expense.  It was a dormant organisation with no operation, and cash in hand was less than $2,000.  In 2009, there was $35,000 donation income and project expense was about 35% (~$15,000) of total expenditure.  It had no paid staff.  The organization main activity was to raise fund for a unique photo exhibition by Leong Ka Tai, which showed showed a series of 40 portraits.

tc.review:
(2012)
核數報告顯示截至2012年末共9個月的財務狀況。除卻物業重估收益，捐款是主要收入來源，約1055萬元。籌款效益普通，平均每籌$100的成本約 $27。籌款費用，項目費用和行政費用佔總支出約20%，67%和7%。由於全年的項目費用約936萬，顯示絕大部分的捐款收入用於項目。由於員工薪酬共約145萬，相信已撥入籌款，項目或行政費用。錄得盈餘，持有現金約1500萬元，足夠一年開支。核數報告清楚列出每項籌款活動的收入和支出，值得讚賞。另外，機構擁有物業正向銀行供款，並以出租。

(2010)
雖然機構未有將籌款活動的收入和捐款分開顯示，但年內有多個籌款活動，加上捐款是最主要收入，估計捐款收入主要是籌款活動所得。籌款效益不俗，平均每籌$100 的成本是$5，而籌款成本佔總支出約7%。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約66%、7%和21%。員工薪酬可能已包括前線員工，可是財務報告或年報沒有顯示前線和行政部員工比例。量入為出，錄得盈餘，持有的現金約足夠11個月營運。但核數報告顯示機構有一筆約800萬的負債，應是物業貸款。網站未有上載服務統計數據，但有更新活動詳情，如2011年的探訪活動、籌款活動和2007 - 2009 年期間建成的水窖等。

tc.name: 香港紅十字會
tc.description: 力求世上人人都能尊重及保護人的生命和尊嚴，並能自願地以一視同仁的態度施以援手，改善弱勢社群的境況。積極推動社群，本著人道理念與志願服務精神，竭力保護生命、關懷傷體、維護尊嚴。堅守基本原則，包括人道、公正、中立、獨立、志願服務、統一和普遍。重視每一個人，不分服務受惠者或提供者，亦提供優質服務，向所有相關人士負責。
tc.summary: 未披露籌款成本，致未能評級。項目支出佔總支出約68%，員工薪酬約佔30%，行政費用不足1%，規模大令行政費用達到經濟效益。超過6成的捐款用以賑災。財務狀況健康，現金及長短期投資等可應付超過4年營運。建議披露籌款成本，並考慮運用部份資金支持本地其它慈善機構。
tc.review: 由於未有披露籌款成本，無法評估籌款成效，所以未能給予評級。項目支出佔總支出約68%，員工薪酬約佔30%，行政費用不足1%。由於規模大，行政費用達到經濟效益。而超過6成的捐款用以賑災，其餘的用於本地服務，包括輸血服務、營社服務、社會關顧、造血幹細胞、心理支援、特殊教育等服務。審計報告清楚列明一般服務、賑災項目、特別項目等的收入和支出狀況，亦列出各類服務的員工和行政支出等，簡單清晰，值得嘉許。財務狀況健康，現金及長短期投資等可應付超過4年營運。
tc.objective: 力求人人都能尊重及保護人的生命和尊嚴，改善弱勢社群的境況

en.name: Beat Drugs Fund Association
en.description:
To promote community efforts to beat drugs, the Government established a Beat Drugs Fund in March 1996 with a capital outlay of HK $350 million
The Government injected $3 billion into the Fund in 2010
Income generated by the Fund is used to provide financial support anti-drug projects including community-wide anti-drug activities covering preventive education and publicity, treatment and rehabilitation, and research
en.summary: $3 billion was injected to the fund in 2010 by the Government.  Fund raising efficiency was estimated by investment gain and investment management fee.  Investment management fee for every $100 gain in 2010 was about $5, and the management fee was about 3% of total expenditure.  Investment gain in 2010 was about $22million and total income (including dividend and interest) was about $55million.  Project expense was about $45million, which was ~90% of total expenditure.  Salaries and operating expense were about 3% and 4% of total expenditure.  It recorded a surplus.  Projects details were listed on the audit report and website.
en.review:
$3 billion was injected to the fund in 2010 by the Government 
Investment gain from the fund will be used to support drug prevention and beating projects
Fund raising efficiency was estimated by investment gain and investment management fee
Investment management fee for every $100 gain in 2010 was about $5
Investment management fee was about 3% of total expenditure
Investment gain in 2010 was about $22million and total income (including dividend and interest) was about $55million
Project expense (mainly grants) was about $45million, which was ~90% of total expenditure
Salaries and operating expense were about 3% and 4% of total expenditure
Recorded a surplus
Cash in hand was over $3billion after the funding from the government in 2010

en.advice: To consider increasing the grants amount and approval process

tc.name: 禁毒基金
tc.description: 鼓勵社會各界致力禁毒，對付毒品問題。一九九六年三月，政府以3.5億港元資本成立禁毒基金，在二零一零年，政府向禁毒基金注資30億元基金的收入用以資助符合撥款準則而又值 得推行的禁毒計劃。凡是以整個社會為對象的禁毒活動，不論是預防教育和宣傳活動、戒毒治療和康復計劃，還是研究項目，都在基金資助之列。
tc.summary: 基金由政府成立，於2010年再注資30億元，該基金的投資所得用於禁毒。籌款效益以投資收入和基金管理費估算。平均每賺$100的管理費為$5，而基金管理費用佔總支出約3%。是年投資收益約$2,200萬元，再加上股息、利息和其它收入，合共約$5,500萬元。項目撥款約$4,500萬元，佔總支出90%。員工薪酬和營運費用佔總支出3%和4%。錄得盈餘。報告和網站詳列已撥款的項目。
tc.review: 基金由政府出資3.5億元於1996年成立，並於2010年再注資30億元。基金用於投資，並將投資所得用於禁毒。該筆基金由專業投資經理管理。因此，估算籌款效益時，以投資收入和基金管理費估算。2010年平均每賺$100的管理費為$5，而基金管理費用佔總支出約3%。是年投資收益約$2,200萬元，再加上股息、利息和其它收入，合共約$5,500萬元。項目撥款約$4,500萬元，佔總支出90%。員工薪酬和營運費用佔總支出3%和4%。錄得盈餘，2010獲政府再注資後，持有超過30億元現金。報告詳列已撥款的項目，網站亦張貼歷年的項目內容，包括學校、醫學會、青少年團體、慈善機構等的教育、禁毒和研究項目。
tc.objective: 鼓勵社會各界致力禁毒，對付毒品問題
tc.advice: 獲注資後可考慮提升批款的銀碼和速度

en.name: Chosen Power
en.description:
Mutual help organization of persons with intellectual disabilities and persons with special learning needs 
To advocate independence, promote mutual respect and acceptance and equality for all people
en.summary: Low administrative cost (about 6% of total expenditure) despite its small scale.  It fully relied on donation with no grants or support from Government or foundation.  Program expense was about 94% of total expenditure.  No staff costs and this might be because of very limited resources.  It recorded a deficit and cash in hand can only support operation for 3 months.  Services include advocate the rights of disabilities, cultural exchange trip, workshops, social service and training etc.
en.review:
No rating is available because of no disclosure of fund raising cost 
Low administrative cost (about 6% of total expenditure) despite its small scale
Fully relied on donation with no grants or support from Government or foundation
Annual income and expense was about $350k and $460k
Most expense was program related expense, which was about 94% of total expenditure
Program expense was mainly the cultural exchange trip for people with intellectual disabilities and special learning needs
No staff costs and this might be because of very limited resources
Recorded a deficit
Cash in hand can only support operation for 3 months
Services include advocate the rights of disabilities, cultural exchange trip, workshops, social service and training etc.
More than 200 members and has partnership with 121 artists for advocacy work 
Services information were available on the website and blog
Organized about 110 public education and advocacy functions and reached more than 130,000 people
Other activities and exchange program report can been read on the blog
en.objective: Mutual help organization of persons with intellectual disabilities and persons with special learning needs
en.advice:
To pay attention to the financial status (deficit)
To consider to put more service and financial reports on the website so that the public can understand the services and needs better

tc.name: 卓新力量
tc.description: 智障人士和有特殊學需要人士的自助組織，學習自主自立，推廣公眾教育，提倡人人平等，建立共融社群。
tc.summary: 規模很小，但行政費用低，只佔總支出6%。完全依賴捐款，沒有政府或基金的資助。項目費用佔總支出94%，沒有全職員工，估計與其資源有限有關。入不敷支，錄得虧損，持有的現金約僅足夠約3個月營運。服務包括倡導殘疾人士權利公約、智障人士和有特殊學需要人士的權利，網絡建立、社區教育、海外考察等。
tc.review: 由於未有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。雖然規模很小，但行政費用低，只佔總支出6%。機構收入完全依賴捐款，沒有政府或基金的資助。全年收入和支出約$35萬元和$46萬元，而絕大部分支出用於項目費用，佔總支出94%，而主要項目是讓智障人士和有特殊學需要人士到外地考察，了到外地考察，了解殘疾人士和智障人士的權利。沒有全職員工，估計與其資源有限有關。入不敷支，錄得虧損，持有的現金約僅足夠約3個月營運。服務包括倡導殘疾人士權利公約、智障人士和有特殊學需要人士的權利，領袖訓練、網絡建立、社區教育、海外考察、政策倡議和社會服務等。現時會員及附屬會員超過200人，並有121位藝術倡導夥伴等。有網站和博客提供活動資訊，其公眾教育和倡議等活動，舉辦110次，並接觸超過13萬人。另有其它活動和倡議工作，可參考其博客。
tc.objective: 智障人士和有特殊學需要人士的自助組織
tc.advice: 應注意入不敷支的情況，可考慮將更多的服務和財務報告上載網站，讓公眾更了解機構的服務和需要

en.name: REGENERATION SOCIETY LIMITED
en.description: To provide social services, rehabilitation programs, health promotion programs, personal guidance as well as healing and health information to cancer and/or chronic patients
en.summary:
Donation activity income and trip settlement income were the major sources of income (~$1million)
Good fundraising efficiency 
Cost of raising every $100 was about $1.5
Project expense and administrative expense were 37% and 11% of total expenditure
Salaries take a big portion, about 50% of total expenditure
Recorded a surplus 
Cash in hand was about $1.2million which can support operation for 10 months</br>
en.review:
Donation activity income and trip settlement income were the major sources of income (~$1million)
Good fundraising efficiency 
Cost of raising every $100 was about $1.5
Project expense and administrative expense were 37% and 11% of total expenditure
Salaries take a big portion, about 50% of total expenditure
Recorded a surplus 
Cash in hand was about $1.2million which can support operation for 10 months
New events are updated timely on the website
Financial statements and big events are listed on the website for downloading
Very transparent
en.objective:
To help patients help themselves and others to get better earlier and go back to society</br>
 improve health consciousness of the public and rise their attention to long term sick people</br>
en.advice: To adjust the portion of salaries

tc.name: 再生會
tc.description: 提供社會服務，富康活動，促進健康活動 個人輔導及治病保健諮詢予癌症及長期病患者
tc.summary: 捐款和賣旗籌款收入是主要的收入來源，約有100萬。籌款效益不俗，平均每籌$100的成本約為$1.5。項目費用和行政費用佔總支出約37%和11%。员工薪酬所占比例大，约为50%，是年錄得盈餘，持有的現金约为120萬元，足夠10个月營運。
tc.review: 捐款和賣旗籌款收入是主要的收入來源，約有100萬。籌款效益不俗，平均每籌$100的成本約為$1.5。項目費用和行政費用佔總支出約37%和11%。员工薪酬所占比例大，约为50%，可能由于筹款数量不多但员工数量过大的原因。是年錄得盈餘，持有的現金约为120萬元，足夠10个月營運。網站及時更新活動進展，并提供了財務情況和再生會運行情況，透明度很高。
tc.objective: 協助長期病患者助人自助，早日康復，重頭社會； 提高公眾人士的健康意識，喚醒大家對長期病患的關注
tc.advice: 調整員工薪酬比例

en.name: Direction Association For The Handicapped
en.description:
To gather strength of the Handicapped, promote self and mutual assistance, use community resources to re-integrate into society 
To assist the Handicapped to develop their potential, strive for welfare, social status, resources and opportunity 
Service teams include visitation, rehabilitation resources, environmental facilities, life education, and recreational activities etc
en.summary: Impressive operational efficiency despite of the small scale.Project costs, salaries and administrative costs were about 51%, 19% and 23% of total expenditure.Scored better than many large scale charities in three indicators. Major source of funding is public donations and the funding from Community Chest.The financial was break even for the year. It served about 1,300 people throughout the year.It also operates social enterprises which provides quality web design and production services. Employees were mainly disabilities.
en.review:
Organisation was small in scale 
Impressive operational efficiency 
Project expenses, staff salaries and administrative costs were about 51%, 19% and 23% of the total expenditure 
Performance indicators is better than many institutions of similar or larger scale 
Rare level of operational efficiency as it is difficult for small scale organisations to achieve economic benefit 
Major source of funding was public donations and the Community Chest 
No ratings in absence of disclosure of fund-raising costs 
Achieved break even for operation  
Loss recorded was due to exchange rate 
Served about 1,300 people throughout the year 
Also operated other social enterprises to provide quality web design and production services, employees were mainly handicaps
en.objective: To collect the strength of handicapped and promote mutual help
en.advice:
To consider increasing publicity to raise more donations and expand services to help more people 
To work with other social enterprises to expand network and customer base, and share resources to enhance efficiency.

tc.name: 路向四肢傷殘人士協會
tc.description: 集合四肢傷殘人士的力量，提倡自助互助，善用社區資源，重新融入社會。協助四肢傷殘人士發展潛能、爭取福利、社會地位、資源及機會，發揮自助精神。服務隊伍包括探訪、復康資源、環境設備、生命教育、和康樂活動等。
tc.summary: 雖然規模很小，但營運效率不俗。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用分別佔總支出約51%，19%和23%。這3項指標較很多規模接近甚至較大的機構都優秀。主要資金來源是公眾捐款和公益金。量入為出，基本上收支平衡。全年服務人次約1,300人。另外亦營辦社會企業，提供網頁設計和精品製作服務，員工主要是傷殘人士。
tc.review:
雖然規模很小，但營運效率不俗。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用分別佔總支出約51%，19%和23%。這3項指標較很多規模接近甚至較大的機構都優秀。一般而言，規模小較難達到經濟效益。此營運效率水平，實屬難得。
主要資金來源是公眾捐款和公益金，由於沒有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。量入為出，基本上收支平衡。是年錄得的虧損是匯率差形成。全年服務人次約1,300人。另外亦營辦社會企業，提供網頁設計和精品製作服務，員工主要是傷殘人士。
tc.objective: 集合四肢傷殘人士的力量，提倡自助互助
tc.advice: 可考慮多作宣傳並提高公眾捐款收入，以便擴充服務，幫助更多有需要人士。另外，可嘗試與其它社會企業合作，除擴充網絡以圖擴大客戶群，或能共享資源提升效益。

en.name: Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation
en.description:
Aims at provide high quality, non-competitive and free arts activities for youth (5 to 25 years old) 
To allow youths from different cultures, backgrounds and abilities to express their creativity through diverse and inspiring programs
Council is committed to serving the disadvantaged and young people with special needs
More than 80,0000 participants in various programs, performances and exhibitions annually
en.summary: Project expense, salaries and administrative cost were about 65%, 22% and 13% of total expenditure. It received activities and arts sponsorship from many large commercial cooperation. Cash in hand could support operation for 9 months. It recorded surplus for the year. We recommend the charity to expand its network and cooperate with other organizations when holding artistic activities. Sharing contacts and network can be expanded and brought more significant social impact.
en.review:
No ratings due to no disclose fund-raising costs 
Project expenses, staff salaries and administrative costs were 65%, 22% and 13% of total expenditure
Received sponsorships from CTIC KA WAH,  Standard Chartered, Goldman Sachs, Hong Kong Exchange, the Pacific, The Body Shop and others organizations for hosting of activities
Activities focus on promotion of the arts to young people, including mural painting, mask making, dance, carnival etc. 
Sound financial management leading to a surplus
Cash held enough to support 9 months of operations
en.objective: To provide high quality and artistic activities to the young people
en.advice:
To expand the network of cooperation to enable more institutions to join co-artistic activities 
To share experience of accessing commercial sponsorship and cooperation with large companies 
To upload annual and audit reports on the website to increase transparency 
To consider releasing information on the number of participants for events to the public

tc.name: 香港青年藝術協會
tc.description: 旨在為5至25歲的青少年提供高質素、非競爭性及費用全免的藝術活動。藉著多元化和富啟發性的計劃，讓不同文化、背景及才能的年青人發揮創意。同時，本會致力服務弱勢及有特殊需要的年青人。每年超過八十萬人次參加各項節目或觀賞表演和展覽。
tc.summary: 項目費用佔總支出65%，員工薪酬約佔22%，行政費用佔13%。獲多間大型商業機構贊助舉辦活動，向青少年推廣藝術。審慎理財量入為出，持有的現金足夠支持約9個月的營運。建議擴大合作網絡，令更多藝術機構能一同協辦活動，藉此分享獲得多間大型商業機構贊助和支持的經驗和合作模式。
tc.review: 因為未有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。項目費用佔總支出65%，員工薪酬約佔22%，行政費用佔13%。該財政年度獲中信嘉華、渣打、高盛、香港交易所、太古、The Body Shop等贊助和合作舉辦活動，向青少年推廣藝術，當中包括壁畫創作、藝術奇趣坊、面譜製作、舞蹈嘉年華等。審慎理財量入為出，錄得盈餘。而持有的現金足夠支持約9個月的營運。
tc.objective: 為青少年提供高質素及費用全免的藝術活動
tc.advice: 擴大合作網絡，令更多藝術機構能一同協辦活動，藉此分享獲得多間大型商業機構贊助和支持的經驗和合作模式，令本地的藝術活動和機構百花齊放。建議提高透明度，於網站上載年報和審計報告。可考慮公佈各項活動的人次，讓公眾了解各項目的效益。

en.name: Caritas Hong Kong
en.description:
Established in 1953 
Incorporated by ordinance in 1981 
To offer relief and rehabilitation services to the poor and the distressed
To help people strive for self-development and self-reliance
Services include social work services, education, medical care, community development and hospitality
en.summary: No audit report is available to the public.  No consolidated annual report, financial highlights or service report.  Some of the service units such as social service department has annual report and financial highlight on its website, and a service center has service report on internet.  Other than the Caritas Newsletter issued every 2-3 months, there is no other system to communicate with the public.  It does not disclose annual income and expense and value of assets held.  It was incorporated by ordinance and no information can be found in company registry.
en.review: No audit report is available to the public.  No consolidated annual report, financial highlights or service report.  Some of the service units such as social service department has annual report and financial highlight on its website, and a service center has service report on internet.  Other than the Caritas Newsletter issued every 2-3 months, there is no other system to communicate with the public.  Reports of some of the service units only represent part of the operation status of the entire organization.  Youth service including library and study room under social service department served more than 1.3 million people time in 2009-2010.  Other services under social service unit served more than 1 million people time.  Other service unit such as medical, education and other service had no service report.  Organization does not disclose consolidated annual income and expense and value of assets held, the  public has no way to know the operation status and fund needs.
en.objective: To offer relief and rehabilitation services to the poor and the distressed
en.advice: To make audit report publicly accessible and provide consolidated service reports so that the public can understand the operation status and the needs of the organization

tc.name: 香港明愛
tc.description: 1953 年成立， 1981年註冊為獨立立案法團，是天主教會在香港的社會服務組織。為貧苦大眾提供救濟及康復服務，致力協助市民尋求自我發展及自力更生。服務範圍包括社會工作、教育、醫療護理和社區服務。
tc.summary: 沒有公開核數報告，亦沒有年報、財務撮要和服務報告。屬下部分服務單位在獨立網站公開年報和財務撮要，例如社會服務部，而某些社區中心則只有服務報告。除了網站的每2-3個月上載的明愛簡報發佈新消息，網站未有任何向公眾交代收支及資產狀況和服務統計數據。受法團條例監管，並非以公司形式註冊，在公司註冊處未能找到機構的資料。
tc.review: 沒有公開核數報告，亦沒有綜合年報、財務撮要和服務報告。屬下部分服務單位在獨立網站公開年報和財務撮要，例如社會服務部，而某些社區中心則只有服務報告。除了網站的每2-3個月上載的明愛簡報發佈新消息，網站未有任何向公眾交代綜合收支及資產狀況和服務統計數據。部分服務單位的數據只代表部分營運狀況，社會服務部的青少年服務和設施，例如圖書館、自修中心等服務人次超過130萬人。其它社會服務如長者社區中心、輔導服務等的服務人次亦超過100萬。而醫療、教育和其它服務單位，未見其報告。受法團條例監管，並非以公司形式註冊，在公司註冊處未能找到機構的資料，公眾難以了解機構的營運狀況和資金需求。
tc.objective: 為貧苦大眾提供救濟及康復服務
tc.advice: 公開賬目，並製作綜合服務簡報，讓公眾更了解機構的營運和需要

en.name: Windshield Charitable Foundation
en.description: Founded a Mutual Support Center to serve new immigrants in HK (migrated to HK for less than 3 years).  Services included providing languages & computer courses, counselling and referral services.  Besides, it provide services to family, children and youth.
en.summary: Audit report was presented in a clear way with detail breakdown, which is commendable.  Its major source of income was interest and dividend.  Fair fundraising efficiency of charitable dinner.  The cost of raising every $100 was about $41, but fundraising expense low only ~3% of total operating expenditure.  Project expense, supporting staff salaries, and administrative expenses were about 56%, 10% and 30% of total operating expenditure(~$4.7million).  It recorded a deficit mainly caused by the drop of value of investment.  Cash & investment in hand were amounted to $100million.
en.review:
Major source of income was interest and dividend
Project income was the 2nd major source of income
The only fundraising dinner had fair fundraising efficiency 
Cost of raising every $100 was about $41
Cost of fundraising event was low which only composed ~3% of total operating expenditure
Project expense including frontline staff cost, supporting staff salaries, and administrative expenses were about 56%, 10% and 30% of total operating expenditure (~$4.7million)
Project income could not cover full expenditure and subsidized by headquarter
Recorded a deficit mainly caused by the drop of value of investment
Cash & investment in hand were amounted to $100million
en.objective: To serve new immigrants to Hong Kong
en.advice:
To consider expanding the services 
To pay attention on the investment strategy

tc.name: 宏施慈善基金
tc.description: 於2003年成立新來港人士互助中心 (宏施慈善基金社會服務處」，為來港定居不足3年的人士及家庭提供服務，包括提供各類語文、電腦、生活適應課程等，另有家庭服務、兒童及青少年服務、個案諮詢及轉介等，助其融入社群。
tc.summary: 核數報告詳盡清楚，一目了然。主要收入來源是利息和股息收入。2011年舉辦的籌款晚宴，籌款效率普通，平均每籌$100的成本約$41，但籌款支出只佔營運支出約3%。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約56%，10%和30%。是年錄得虧損，主因是投資減值。持有的現金和投資若值1億元。
tc.review: 核數報告詳盡、清楚，一目了然讓公眾了解收支去向，值得讚賞。慈善基金的主要收入來源是利息和股息收入、其次是項目收入，共約$360萬元。2011年舉辦的籌款晚宴，籌款效率普通，平均每籌$100的成本約$41，但籌款支出只佔營運支出約3%。項目費用(包括項目前綫員工)、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約56%，10%和30%。若單看項目收支狀況，屬入不敷支，需要總部補貼。全年支出若$1,300萬，包括非營運和非現金支出的投資減值(~$840萬)。是年入不敷支，錄得虧損。持有的現金和投資若值1億元。
tc.objective: 服務新來港定居人士，助其融入社群。
tc.advice: 可考慮擴充服務，並須注意基金的投資狀況

(2011)
規模小，全年收入由去年58萬元下跌至不足38萬元，收入少了接近4 成。主要收入來源是政府撥款，其次是捐款。由於沒有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。核數報告列出支出明細，包括社會福利署資助項目的員工薪酬，由於屬前線員工，被撥入項目費用。項目費用，員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約44%，47%和8%。而全年支出約76萬元，是收入的兩倍，嚴重入不敷支。持有的現金約足夠10個月營運。服務包括面談、探訪、專題講座、手托和鼻托借用、興趣班、會員通訊等。現有超過800名會員。全年接觸超過11,000人次，服務約1,000人次。

(2010)由於沒有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。項目費用，員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約37%，56%和7%。租金佔總支出若8%。除辦工室外，還有可容納50人的活動室，和供患病兒童玩耍的角落，所以撥入項目費用。礙於規模小，暫時難以達到規模效益。全年入不敷支，持有的現金足夠若1年半的營運。網站提供兔唇裂顎病症、活動和講座的詳細資料，亦定期出版會訊。未有服務人次統計。

No estimation of staff costs to be grouped under program expense was made 
Recorded a deficit for the year 
Cash in hand can support operation for 22 months 
Audit report also show the status of other fund including Development, Youth Development and Women Development fund etc., and all those fund had operation as there was no income or expense (except an investment income amounted to $5,000).  Those fund reserve maintain the same level as the previous year. 
Operating hostels for drug rehabilitation centres
en.objective: To help drug addicts, ex-prisoners, triad members, prostitutes and problem youth to return into our society through Christian drug rehabilitation.
en.advice:
To separately list out the cost of frontline and administrative staffs 
To upload more programmes information, service statistics, and financial information so that the public will know more about the operation status of the organization
To present the breakdown of operation expense with more details so that the public can understand the operating status better

tc.name: 基督教互愛中心
tc.description: 藉戒毒康復訓練事工，幫助吸毒者、釋刑人士、黑社會背景的人、妓女及問題青少年重投社會。營運中途宿舍、戒毒中心等。
tc.summary: 沒有披露籌款成本和項目費用，所以未能評級。主要資金來源是教友奉獻。員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約 66% 和34%。財務報告只簡單地表達幾項數字，估計員工薪酬已包括前線員工。另外，行政費用亦包括其它營運費用。入不敷支，錄得虧損，但持有的現金約足夠22個月營運。設有戒毒中心和中途宿舍。
tc.review: 由於沒有披露籌款成本和項目費用，所以未能評級。主要資金來源是教友奉獻。基本上是沒收益員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約 66% 和34%。財務報告只簡單地表達幾項數字，沒有分別顯示前線和行政部員工的薪酬，所以未能估算應計入項目費用的員工費用。另外，行政費用亦包括其它營運費用。入不敷支，錄得虧損，但持有的現金約足夠22個月營運。核數報告除了營運基金，亦將其它基金例如青少年發展、女性發展、男人發展等基金的收益列出，但數個基金沒有營運，沒收入(除了一筆約$5000的投資收入)或支出，與前一年的儲備水平一樣。機構設有戒毒中心和中途宿舍，而網站未有顯示服務統計數據。
tc.objective: 藉戒毒康復訓練事工，幫助吸毒者、釋刑人士、黑社會背景的人、妓女及問題青少年重投社會
tc.advice: 可列出職員崗位令公眾更了解所需的人力和資源，並在網站上載更多日常的服務資訊和統計數據，及財務數據。此外，或可將營運費用的明細，以較為詳盡的方式表達，讓公眾了解營運狀況。

en.name: Tung Wah Group of Hospitals
en.description:
Adheres to the mission of caring for the sick, rescue crisis, elderly rehabilitation, developing talents and educating youths 
Largest charity/social welfare institution in Hong Kong 
Medical care, education and social services provided at low-cost or free 
A total of more than 200 service units, and10,000 employees.
en.summary: Highly effective fund-raising, and the major service units have recorded a small surplus, low administrative costs, management leadership, and, prudent financial management, commendable appreciation.Because of good management, the rental income and service unit surplus exceeded the total amount of public donation. Donation was idle.We propose services expansions or cooperate with other charities so as to share effective fund-raising experience. Tung Wah may even consider taking the fund-raising role for other charities so that public donation can be delivered to the people who need help.
en.review:
Effective fund-raising (cost of HK $ 8 for every HK $ 100) 
Fund-raising expenses less than 1% of total expenditure 
High efficiency in management and operation, regardless of health, education or social services 
Sound financial management despite having operating income and more than 2.3 billion of government funding 
Recorded a small surplus in every service unit 
Rental income of more than 300 million in 2009, exceeding public donations 
Excellence in financial management and allocation of resources in various departments 
Organisation pursues high returns 
Recorded surplus of $380 million in 2009, reflecting efficient and careful fiscal management 
Public fund-raising amounts to about $220 million, and has yet to be spent on charitable services.
en.objective: To serve the sick, elderlies, and the youth
en.advice:
To avoid public donations being idle, may consider donations or low-interest loans to charitable organizations in need of money 
To share their way of fund-raising methods with organisations that has low efficiency 
To consider helping small charitable organisations to raise funds, so that public resources can be effectively allocated 
To consider extending the scope of charitable activities with reference to foreign examples, i.e establishment of charitable venture capital fund

tc.name: 東華三院
tc.description: 東華三院一直秉承「救病拯危、安老復康、興學育才、扶幼導青」的使命和承諾，是香港規模最大的慈善社會福利機構。在過去百多年，東華的醫療、教育及社會服務均為市民提供收費低廉或免費的服務。現時東華三院共有超過200個服務單位，員工超過10,000名。
tc.summary: 籌款效益極高，而且主要的服務單位都錄得少量盈餘，行政費用低，管理層領導有方，兼且謹慎理財，值得表揚讚賞。同時，因為善於管理，租金收入及服務單位的盈餘超過當年的公眾捐款總額，令捐款被閒置。建議機構擴張服務，或與其它同類機構分享高效的籌款心得，甚至代為募款，令捐款能盡早送遞至需要幫助的人。
tc.review: 籌款效益高，每HK$100捐款的成本為HK$8。而籌款費用佔總支出不足1%。管理和營運效率極高，無論醫療、教育、和社會服務，雖然從政府獲得超過23億撥款，而且有營運收入，但謹慎理財的態度令各單位錄得少量盈餘。2009年自置物業的租金收入超過3億，勝於公開募款。東華三院管理層無論在財務管理，或各部門的資源分配都恰到好處，善於理財且追求高效益。2009年錄得3.8億盈餘，這反映管理層高效和小心的理財態度。而公眾募款約2.2億，東華三院並未動用一分一毫。
tc.objective: 救病拯危、安老復康、興學育才、扶幼導青
tc.advice: 為免公眾捐款被閒置，東華三院可考慮捐款或低息貸款予更需要資金的慈善機構。另外，可與募款效益較低的機構分享其高效籌款方式，甚至代為籌款，令社會資源能更有效地分配至有需要的人手中。此外，亦可考慮擴展慈善業務的範疇，參考國外例子，成立慈善創投基金。

en.name: Children’s Heart Foundation
en.description:
Services include grant for surgical equipment, purchase of medical equipment, arranging exchanges overseas doctors for medical visits for parents of hospitalized children residential services and education 
Seminars held regularly to raise public awareness of congenital heart disease 
To provide economic, psychological and information support and assistance to children with congenital heart disease and their families
To promote research and treatment of congenital heart disease
en.summary: Surplus in 2009 was 3 times of the charitable project expenditure. It reflects the charity has not made a good use of donations.We propose the charity to consider widening the service scope so that more people can be benefited.The proportion of salary to total expenditure was at a high level.
en.review:
No Rating, as fund-raising costs wasn’t listed and couldn’t be calculated 
Financial assistance on operation costs of sick children, education and exhibition programs account for 30% of total expenditures 
Staff salaries and administrative costs accounted for 55% and 11%, of total expenditures 
Difficult to convince the majority of the public that donations can directly help the needy sick children and their families
In 2009, recorded a surplus of HK $ 1.83million which is 3 times of the project expenditure 
Cash and long-term investments, sufficient to support the next 9 years of operation 
Agency failed to make good use of donations to help needy children with heart disease and their families
en.objective: To enhance public awareness of congenital heart disease, and offer supports, psychological help to children suffering from heart disease and their families
en.advice:
To clearly list front-line counsellors and project-related costs 
To reduce staff costs, and increase the total number of recipients 
To provide more financial assistance to children in need of funding for surgery 
To broaden scope of service to other heart patients 
To use donations to help those in need as soon as possible

tc.name: 兒童心臟基金會
tc.description: 服務包括津貼資助手術器具、購置醫療設備、安排海外醫生到訪進行醫學交流、為留院病童父母提供住宿服務和定期舉辦教育及講座等，務求提高市民對先天性心臟病的認識，向患有先天性心臟病童及其家屬提供經濟、心理及資訊支援及協助，以及推動有關先天性心臟病的研究及治療。
tc.summary: 2009年的盈餘是慈善項目支出的3倍，反映機構未有善用捐款幫助患病兒童。建議擴闊服務對象，令更多人受惠。另外，員工薪金佔總支出的比例偏高，應多加注意。
tc.review: 審計報表未有列出籌款費用，無法計算籌款效率及佔總支出的比例，導致無法評級。按財務報表數據，經濟援助患病兒童的手術費用、教育和展覽項目，只佔總支出30%，比例屬於最低類別。而員工薪酬則佔總支出55%，行政費則佔11%，兩者合共佔66%。公眾難以被說服大部份捐款能直接幫助有需要的患病兒童及其家人。2009年錄得HK$183萬盈餘，是項目支出3倍，而持有的現金和長期投資，足夠支持未來9年的營運。這反映機構未能及時善用捐款，幫助有需要的心臟病兒童及其家人。
tc.objective: 提高市民對先天性心臟病的認識，向患有先天性心臟病童及其家屬提供經濟、心理及資訊支援
tc.advice: 清楚列明輔導員等前綫項目相關費用，減低員工薪酬支出，並增加受助人的總數，多些資助需要經濟援助進行手術的兒童，甚至擴闊服務對象至其它心臟病患者，善用捐款令款項能盡早幫助有需要的人。

en.name: Senior Citizen Home Safety Association
en.description:
To supply "Personal Emergency Link Service" and "Personal Emergency Mobile Link Services ", with advanced system to connect users and the 24-hour operation center 
To provide immediate and appropriate assistance for elderly 
Response to the emotional and daily needs of the elderly through hotline 
To establish volunteer network and launch community care for elderly with other social services 
To achieve concept of "holistic care for the elderly " 
To provide butler service, home resource centers and educational programs.
en.summary: It has reduced transparency - audit report was available in 2008-2009 annual report but no longer available in 2010-11 annual report.  It had low fundraising efficiency (excluding flag day). The cost of raising every $100 was about $40 in TVB program and other fundraising activities.  Major source of income was leasing income($67million), sales income($13million) and general donation ($10million).  Program expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 18%, 58% and 15% of total expenditure.  Salaries should have included frontline staffs, however, no number of front line staffs has been disclosed and no estimation of program staff salaries to be grouped under program expense was made.  It recorded a surplus of $11million (excluding amortization and depreciation expense) and general donation has not been utilized during the year.  Cash and investment in hand were about $110million, which can support operation for about 1 year.
en.review:
(2011)
Reducing transparency - audit report was available in 2008-2009 annual report but no longer available in 2010-11 annual report
Low fundraising efficiency (excluding flag day) - cost of raising every $100 was about $40 in TVB program and other fundraising activities
Fundraising expense was only about 1% of total expenditure
Major source of income was leasing income($67million), sales income($13million) and general donation ($10million)
Program expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 18%, 58% and 15% of total expenditure
Salaries should have included frontline staffs, however, no number of front line staffs has been disclosed and no estimation of program staff salaries to be grouped under program expense was made
Non-cash expenditure such as amortization and depreciation was about $12million
Recorded a surplus of $11million (excluding amortization and depreciation expense)
General donation has not been utilized during the year
Only the fund raised through TVB program and other activities were used
Cash and investment in hand were about $110million, which can support operation for about 1 year



(2009)
Impressive fundraising efficiency, with costs only about 2% of total expenditures 
Main source of income were rental income and personal contributions to the institution  
Low administrative costs, project expenses and staff salaries were about 10%, 20% and 53% of total expenditure 
As there is a 24-hour Personal Emergency Link Service Center, expenses included front-line staff salaries 
Contributions were mainly for people in need and all-round home Personal Emergency Link Service 
From 2008 to 2009, about 10,800 users were cases of charity 
Volunteers visited more than 20,000 people in homes for elderly and private homes 
Constantly developing new services and care for the needs of the elderly 
Some of the cash were used for short and long-term investments 
In the year 2008 to 2009, recorded surplus exceeding public donations 
All public contributions were put into the Fund reserves to support future costs of lifeline users  
As at the end of 2009, the fund reserves has approximately $ 4,350,0000, enough for  the costs in the next 3 years
en.objective: To provide Personal Emergency Link Service to elderly for immediate assistance
en.advice:
(2010)
To support high transparency and make the audit report available on the annual report again, so that the public can understand the operation status of the organisation better
To consider improving the fundraising efficiency


(2009)
To separately list out front-line and administrative staff to improve ratings 
To consider sharing experiences with other charitable organizations who are serving the elderly 
Make low-interest loans or participate in other institutions

tc.name: 長者安居服務協會
tc.description: 提供「一線通平安鐘服務」和「一線通隨身寶服務」，以先進系統連接使用者及協會24小時運作的中心，讓長者能獲得即時及適切的援助。透過長者熱線服務，回應長者之情緒及日常生活上之需要。亦建立義工關顧網絡，發動社區人士關心長者，再配合其他社會服務，實現「全面關顧長者」的理念。此外，亦提供管家服務、居家通資源中心和推廣教育活動。
tc.summary: 透明度倒退 － 2010－11的年報沒有核數報告（2008－09年報則有）。 若不計及賣旗籌款，只計算TVB 和其他籌款活動， 則平均每籌$100的成本約$40， 籌款效益低。 主要收入來源是產品租金收入（6730萬)， 其次是一般捐款收入（約1000萬)。 另外，管家易家居服務和銷售收入約1300萬。 項目費用，員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約18%，58%， 15%。 估計員工薪酬已包括前綫員工。 若不計算非現金流出的費用， 錄得盈餘約$1100萬。即一般捐款收入並未被運用動用，持有的現金和可變現的投資約$1.1 億元， 足夠支持約1年的營運。
tc.review:
(2011)
透明度倒退 － 2010－11的年報沒有核數報告（2008－09年報則有）。 若不計及賣旗籌款，只計算TVB 和其他籌款活動， 則平均每籌$100的成本約$40， 籌款效益低。 籌款費用只佔總支出1%。 主要收入來源是產品租金收入（6730萬)， 其次是一般捐款收入（約1000萬)。 另外，管家易家居服務和銷售收入約1300萬。 項目費用，員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出約18%，58%， 15%。 估計員工薪酬已包括前綫員工， 但由於未披露前線員工比例，所以未能估算應撥入項目費用的員工薪酬。 是年非現金的費用如攤銷和折舊費用合共約$1200萬。 若不計算非現金流出的費用， 錄得盈餘約$1100萬。即一般捐款收入並未被運用動用，只有部分經電視和賣旗籌得的款項被運用。 持有的現金和可變現的投資約$1.1 億元， 足夠支持約1年的營運。 



(2009)
籌款效益不俗，籌款支出只佔總支出約2%。機構的主要收入來源是租務收入和個人捐款。行政費用約佔總支出10%，屬低水平。項目支出佔總支出約20%，而員工薪酬約佔53%。由於有24小時的一線通平安鐘服務中心，估計已包含前綫員工薪酬。捐款主要是為有需要的人提供一線通平安鐘和全方位家居服務，2008至2009年度的慈善個案使用者約10,800人，而義工隊探訪居家長者和私營安老院的人次共超過20,000人次。而且不斷研發新服務，照顧長者需要，值得嘉許。管理層審慎理財，財務狀況健康，將部分現金作長短期投資。2008至2009年度錄得的盈餘超過是年的公眾捐款，而所有公眾捐款撥入基金儲備以資助平安鐘使用者的未來費用。截至2009年末，該基金儲備約4,350萬元，足夠資助慈善平安鐘使用者未來3年的費用。
tc.objective: 提供「一線通平安鐘服務」，讓長者獲得即時援助
tc.advice:
(2011)
提高透明度， 再次將核數報告在年報顯示，若公眾能獲得更多關於機構的資訊。 並須考慮改善籌款活動的效率。


(2009)
規模大擁有經濟效益，兼且財政健康，營運不俗。建議將前綫和行政部員工分別出來，可提升評級。另外，可考慮與其它服務長者的慈善機構分享經驗，甚至低息貸款或參與那些機構，令市民的捐款能更快速回饋社會，讓更多長者受惠。

en.name: 1Step Association
en.description:
To serve physically handicapped people due to work related serious injury 
To provide them with one-stop advisory and support services, including medical, legal and social services, and professional advice to obtain reasonable compensation
To help injured people and their families to adapt to the situation
To link up different groups in society  to fight for  rights of disabled workers 
To reflect to the authorities on the shortcomings of social policy, and help achieve reasonable job securities for all employees
en.summary: It did not disclose fund-raising costs so rating is unavailable.It recorded net loss for two consecutive years. The deficit might be due to paying legal consulting fee for handicapped caused by work-injuries and fighting for disability compensation. Organization is not actively raising fund but focused on helping those suffering in injuries.High transparency, and timely upload the latest audited financial situation.
en.review:
No rating is available - no disclosure in fund-raising costs 
Serious deficit in past two years 
Expenses incurred from providing legal advices to people fighting for compensation for work-related injuries, , emotional counseling and other staff costs 
No persistent funding for programs and no active fund-raising activities 
Focused on helping people with work-related injuries 
Very transparent, and uploaded the latest audited financial statement on the website
en.objective: To serve handicapped suffering from serious injuries from work; To provide one-stop advisory and support services.
en.advice:
To have more public promotions
To increase public awareness of agency services, and raise funds so as to help more people in need
To raise funds so as to aid current financial situation, and help the long-term sustainable business 
To raise public awareness of the injury events and ,improve community care and understanding for injured people.

tc.name: 自強協會
tc.description: 服務因工傷導致嚴重肢體傷殘人士，為他們提供一站式的諮詢及支援服務，包括提供醫療、法律及社會服務之專業意見、協助爭取合理賠償、幫助工傷人士及其家庭盡快適應。亦會結連社會上不同的團體進行充權工作，屬下的權益小組也致力爭取殘疾人士應得的權利。對於僱員補償與職業安全的議題，亦會向有關當局反映社會政策上的流弊，為全港打工仔爭取合理的職業保障。
tc.summary: 未有顯示籌款成本，所以無法評級。連續兩年都有嚴重的入不敷支，估計與為因工傷導致傷殘的人士爭取賠償，提供法律意見、情緒輔導等的員工費用有關。機構未有積極籌款，主力協助有需要的工傷人士。透明度極高，而且及時上載最新的已審計財務狀況，值得嘉許。
tc.review: 由於未有顯示籌款成本，所以無法評級。連續兩年都有嚴重的入不敷支，估計與為因工傷導致傷殘的人士爭取賠償，提供法律意見、情緒輔導等的員工費用有關。機構沒有持續的基金資助，卻未有積極籌款，而是主力協助有需要的工傷人士。透明度極高，而且及時上載最新的已審計財務狀況，值得嘉許。
tc.objective: 服務因工傷導致嚴重肢體傷殘人士，提供一站式的諮詢及支援服務。
tc.advice: 多作推廣宣傳，令公眾認識機構的服務，然後籌募經費，令更多有需要的人得到幫助。籌募經費能減低機構入不敷支的情形，有助長遠持久的經營。而且能提高公眾對工傷事件的認識，提高社會對工傷人士的關心和了解。

en.name: MED-ART
en.description:
To bring care and comfort to those within hospice or long term confinement in Hong Kong
To provide medical treatment, surgery evaluation to orphans babies in China

tc.name: 香港青年獎勵計劃

en.name: Pet Favour Garden
en.description:
To enhance people’s moral value and treatment of animals
To strive for animal welfare
en.summary: Seems like a shell charity.  It received no donation.  Annual expense was about $5,800 including $3,000 audit fee, and $2,450 business registration fee.  No expense was related to charitable activities, and it holds no  cash or asset.  Website stated that it was incorporated in 2007 and gained the s.88 charity status in 2008.  Besides, Website and Facebook page posted the latest activities showing that it is not a dormant charity.
en.review:
Seems like a ‘shell’ charity 
Audit report stated the financial between the period of June 26, 2009 (date of incorporation) and Mar 31, 2010
No donation income (not even $1) during the period 
Annual expense was about $5,800 including $3,000 audit fee, and $2,450 business registration fee
No charitable activities expense
No cash or asset
Website stated that it was incorporated in 2007 and gained the s.88 tax exemption in 2008
Service report for 2007/2008 and 2008/2009 were available online, but no service report for 2009/2010
No detail financial details was available 
Website and Facebook page posted the latest activties showing it is not a dormant charity but an active organization
Announcement on the website stated that it switched from a society to a registered company in June 2009
It did not get the transfer approval from Inland Revenue Department until Nov 2010, and keep operating as a society during the period
Reason of switching to a registered company was to increase the transparency
The reason is difficult for the public to understand as the organization could post the service and financial report for 2009/2010 if it would like to increase the transparency
The fact is that has raised concerns from the public about running as a ‘shell’ charity with no activities, and the public did not see improvement in transparency
en.objective:
To enhance people’s moral value and treatment of animals</br>
To strive for animal welfare
en.advice: To post the service and financial report for 2009/2010, so that the public can understand the operation status better

tc.summary: 疑似是一間「空殼」慈善機構。完全沒有捐款，全年支出僅約$5,800，當中$3,000屬核數費用，其餘則為公司註冊費用，沒有任何關於慈善活動的支出。此外，亦沒有任何資產或現金。可是，機構網站顯示早於2007年成立，並於2008獲得慈善機構的稅務豁免地位，網站和Facebook 專頁都顯示機構有活動，並非「睡眠戶」。
tc.review: 疑似是一間「空殼」慈善機構。核數報告顯示機構於2009年6月26日成立，而截至2010年3月31日，公司沒有收過一分錢捐款，是零收入。而全年支出僅約$5,800，當中$3,000屬核數費用，其餘則為公司註冊費用。即是全年行政費用佔總支出100%，而機構沒有任何關於慈善活動的支出。此外，沒有任何資產或現金。可是，機構網站顯示早於2007年成立，並於2008獲得慈善機構的稅務豁免地位，亦於網站貼上2007-2008和2008-2009的服務報告，但內裡只顯示支出的比例，而沒有給予實際數字。網站和Facebook 專頁都顯示機構有活動，並非「睡眠戶」。網站亦有啟示，指2009年6月機構由社團改為公司形式，而稅局的慈善機構的牌照於2010年11月才完成審批，所以期內繼續以社團營運。而轉為公司形式是希望提高透明度。這個理由令人費解。若希望提高透明度，只需自行將2009-2010的服務和財務報告張貼於網站便可，毋需轉為公司。事實亦顯示機構的透明度未有因為轉為公司註冊而提高，反而令人懷疑其為一間「空殼」慈善機構。
tc.objective: 加強人們正確對待動物的道德觀念，以及為動物爭取應有福利
tc.advice: 上載2009/2010的服務和財務報告，讓公眾更了解營運狀況

en.name: Ronald McDonald House

Cost of raising every $100 was about $7 and fund raising expense was about 13% of total expenditure.  Project and service expense which included mostly salaries was about 68% of total expenditure.  Administrative expense was about 19% of total expenditure.  It recorded a surplus, and cash and investment in hand can support operation for 8 years
en.review:
(2010)
Submitted the latest audit report (2010) in Oct 2011
Program & service expense and fundraising expense etc were clearly stated on the audit report
Depreciation expense was about $2.2million which was about 35% of total expenditure
To give a fair view, we exclude the depreciation expense when we analyzed the operation efficiency, because depreciation had no cash outflow
Total income was about $13million, and fundraising income contributed almost 50% of total income
High fund raising efficiency
Cost of raising every $100 was about $7
Fund raising expense was about 13% of total expenditure
Project and service expense which included mostly salaries was about 68% of total expenditure
Administrative expense was about 19% of total expenditure
No estimation of salaries of supporting staffs can be made and therefore no score under salary indicator
Recorded a surplus amounted to 66% of total income
Cash and investment in hand can support operation for 8 years


(2008)
No rating because fund raising costs was not disclosed 
Latest financial report submitted is for fiscal year 2007 which is outdated
Medical sponsor amounts to 7% of total expenditures, while salary and other expenses both
accounted for 30% of total expenditure each.
Surplus for 2006 and 2007 amounted to HK$490,0000 and HK$ 411,0000 respectively
In 2006, surplus exceeded total public funding, while it accounted for 74% of public donations in
2007
Organization holds a cash amount that is sufficient for 3 years of operation, thus reflecting the
underutilization of funds
2007 financial statements disclosed a zero interest rate loan that has no repayment date, from
the organization to McDonald’s restaurant

en.advice:
(2010)
To consider stating the proportion of frontline and supporting staff
To expand the service and utilize the resources asap so that more people in need will be benefited


(2008)
• Enhance public confidence in institutions by submitting the updated financial reports as soon as
possible
• Clearly account for low project expenses and other high costs expenditures
• Reasons behind the administration of zero interest loans with no repayment date to McDonalds
restaurant should be explained to public

tc.name: 麥當勞叔叔之家慈善基金
tc.description: 麥當勞叔叔之家以服務病童為宗旨。為病童及其家人提供舒適的臨時家園，以拉近彼此間的心靈距離，獲得精神上的支持。忘卻身體上的病苦。
tc.summary: 全年收入約$1,300萬元，而籌款活動收入是主要收入來源，平均每籌$100的成本約$7，而籌款支出佔總支出約13%。項目費用佔總支出約68%，當中主要包括員工薪酬。行政費用佔總支出約19%。是年綠得大量盈餘，持有的現金和投資能支持8年營運。
tc.review:
(2010)
於2011年10月向公司註冊處提交最新的2010年度審計報告，內裡清楚列明項目服務支出、籌款成本等。由於折舊費用(~$220萬) 佔總支出比例很高(~35%)，而折舊費用沒有實質現金流出，本站分析其善款支出時，將不計及折舊費用。全年收入約$1,300萬元，而籌款活動收入是主要收入來源，平均每籌$100的成本約$7，其籌款效益高。而籌款支出佔總支出約13%。項目費用佔總支出約68%，當中包括員工薪酬。全年員工薪酬佔總支出約52%，但未能估算支援部的員工的比例，致'員工薪酬'一欄未能給予評分。行政費用佔總支出約19%。是年綠得大量盈餘(佔收入的約66%)。持有的現金和投資能支持8年營運。

(2008)
於2009年6月18日向公司註冊處提交的審計報告，是2007財政年度的報告，完全不合時宜。截至2010年12月30日仍未遞交2008年和2009年的財政報告。作為慈善機構，麥當勞叔叔之家應向公眾交代財務狀況。根據2007年度的財務報告，因為未有透露籌款費用，所以未能給予評級。但直接資助的項目支出，即醫療贊助，只佔總支出的7%，而員工薪金則佔30%，其它費用(未有說明去處)亦佔約30%。2006年和2007分別錄得HK$490萬和HK$411萬盈餘，而2006年的盈餘更超過當年的公開募款總額，2007年的盈餘則佔是年公開募款的74%。另外，機構持有的現金約能支持3年的營運。這些數字反映大部份的捐款被閒置，未有被妥善利用。此外，2007 年的財務報表顯示麥當勞叔叔之家借了約HK$220萬元給麥當勞餐廳，而該筆借款是零利率兼且沒有償還期限。
tc.objective: 為病童及其家人提供舒適的臨時家園
tc.advice:
(2010)
可考慮列出前綫和支援部員工薪酬，並盡快擴張服務，讓更多人受惠


(2008)
提高透名度並盡快提交2008年和2009年的審計報告，以提升公眾對機構的了解和信心。另外，應向公眾交代偏低的項目支出，和相對偏高的其它費用。此外，亦應向公眾說明為何非牟利的麥當勞叔叔之家會以零利率和無期限的借款予牟利的麥當勞餐廳。至於慈善項目方面，建議擴闊服務範圍，靈活運用捐款令更多人受惠。

tc.summary: 核數報告的投資產品的性質、價值、收益和虧損、已抵押银行存款和現金流狀況引人注目，請參閱詳細評級報告內的評語。
tc.review:
本來純粹推廣宗教的慈善機構，並非本站的評級對象，但志蓮淨苑向社會福利署申請了在公眾地方進行慈善籌款，所以納入評級對象。由於未有披露籌款成本，所以未能評級。
志蓮淨苑的建設基金和其它基金的核數報告未有顯示與學校或安老中心有關的項目，而安老中心的網站有其獨立的核數報告，估計學校亦有獨立報告。
建設基金的主要資金來源是捐款，其次是社會福利署的撥款。項目費用、員工薪酬、和行政費用佔總支出約44%，31%和13%。報告中最引人注目的並非項目費用和員工薪酬佔總支出的比例， 而是投資產品的性質、價值、收益和虧損，和已抵押银行存款。截至2009年3月31日，股票投資虧損超過9,100萬元，而全年各種投資產品的總虧損約7,600萬元。經歷金融海嘯，虧損其實無可厚非，但核數報告還顯示機構持有股票掛勾票據(Equity Linked Note) 價值超過4,200萬。慈善機構運用捐款儲備投資時，應盡量謹慎。雖然股票掛勾票據的利息高，但亦是高風險投資，不適宜慈善機構投資。
另外，雖然2008-2009年度入不敷支錄得虧損，但截至2009年3月31日，機構持有的現金接近2.3億。核數報告內的現金流顯示2009-2010年的財政年度，動用接近2.5億元投資。當時算是股市低位，於非常時期運用非常手段，務求投資賺錢減低前一年的虧損，不可說不合理，事實亦賺了約3,400萬元。只是，機構能持有並動用2.3億元現金投資，顯示大部分的捐款被投閒置散，未有妥善運用於有需要的人身上。此外，報告亦顯示一筆約5,600萬元的已抵押银行存款(pledged bank deposit)，但未有銀行貸款，而是作股票掛勾票據的抵押。機構持有的現金和投資產品的價值超過3億，亦沒有向銀行貸款的需要，令公眾難以理解其投資策略。

tc.advice: 向公眾清楚交代財務賬目、管理方法、和投資方針，包括選擇投資產品的條件和篩選程序。

tc.objective: 協助曾違法人士重新建立自我，履行社會責任，並積極參與社區預防犯罪工作。
tc.advice: 可考慮提高公眾捐款比例，並加入附註讓公眾更了解特別基金的項目營運收支狀況

tc.description: 旨在服務香港及中國落後山區的兒童，讓他們得到更多的學習機會，以及為他們建設更好的學習環境。提供援助予兒童及青少年，推廣兒童及青少年的基礎教育。建設校舍，提高學校的一般設備及教師質素。
tc.summary: 項目費用佔77%，行政費用約24%，沒有員工薪酬，估計已撥入行政費用。審計報告只簡單說明捐款支出，沒有說明用途。網站指機構宗旨是助學，可是沒有年報供下載，亦未有提供每年興建的學校和學生等統計數據，公眾未能得知項目成效和善款去向。建議提高透明度說明捐款去向，並提供項目的詳細資料或統計數據。
tc.review: 由於沒有披露項目籌款收入，所以無法評級。籌款支出佔總支出若不足1%。項目費用佔77%，行政費用約24%，沒有員工薪酬，估計已撥入行政費用。審計報告只簡單說明捐款支出，沒有說明用途。網站指機構宗旨是助學，特別是內地兒童。由於沒有年報供下載，亦未有提供每年興建的學校和學生等統計數據，公眾未能得知項目成效和善款去向。
tc.objective: 旨在服務香港及中國落後山區的兒童，讓他們得到學習機會
tc.advice: 提高透明度說明捐款去向，並提供項目的詳細資料或統計數據，讓公眾更了解機構的服務範圍和效益，有助提高公眾募款成效。可考慮提供每所學校的建築費，甚至部份合作條款。另外，或可與其它同類機構合作，提高社會效益並公眾的關注度。

en.name: Soul Talk Foundation
en.description:
To serve women of different nationalities, culture, education or religious background, to take care of their problems arising from relationships 
To provide professional services to help them get rid of grief, and start a new life 
To provide short-term accommodation, so that they can heal their emotional wounds 
To provide free optional counseling services, support groups and educational workshops 
To help them deal with different issues, including: abuse, separation / divorce, custody, kidnapping, financial, family death, unemployment, loss of self-esteem / value, such as cross-border marriages or accidents 
Services include free accommodation, meals and transport.
en.summary: Effective fund-raising strategies with no staff cost as all were volunteers.Administrative costs 14% of total expenditure, while the project costs and staff pay 13% of the total expenditure and 70%, a high proportion of staff salaries, estimates that it's relevant to full-time counselors, social workers and other frontline staff, and on a small scale.Served 1500 to 2000 women during the year.The proposed increase in public donations total revenue, and expand the scale so that more women can be benefit.
en.review:
Effective fund-raising because of volunteers helped with fund raising at zero cost. 
Administrative costs, project expenses and staff salaries were 14%, 13% and 70% of the total expenditure
Proportion of staff salaries is high, possibly due to presence of full-time counsellors, social workers and other frontline staff in a small organisation 
Served 1500-2000 women throughout the year
Recorded a small surplus, and cash in hand can support 9 months operation 
Audit report clearly showed the financial position of each special fund
en.objective: Emotional caring for women with relationships crisis, and providing professional services
en.advice:
To list the project front-line staff and administrative staff salaries separately 
To increase the proportion of total income from public contributions
To expand the scale, so that more women can be benefit 
To consider cooperation with other local charitable organizations to broaden the network and contacts so as to help many more women in need.

tc.name: 心話
tc.description: 服務來自不同國籍、文化、教育程度或宗教背景的婦女，照顧她們在情感及關係上遇上的危機，提供專業服務，幫助她們擺脫悲傷，重獲新生。「心話愛心之家」為危機中婦女提供二日至二個月的短期住宿，讓她們能治療心靈創傷，再展燦爛人生。她們可選擇接受免費輔導服務，參與支援小組或教育工作坊。機構會幫助她們處理不同的問題，包括：虐待，分居/離婚、監護、綁架、財務、親人離世、失業、失去自尊/價值、跨境婚姻或意外事故等。婦女們在我們溫情洋溢的環境下，漸漸走出困境，抹去悲傷。心話的服務包括免費的住宿，膳食和交通。
tc.summary: 籌款效益高，由義工幫忙以零成本公開募款。行政費用佔總支出14%，而項目費用和員工薪酬各佔總支出13%和70%，員工薪酬比例高，估計與專職輔導員、社工等前綫員工，及規模小有關。每年服務1500至2000名婦女。建議增加公眾捐款佔總收入的比例，並擴張規模，令更多婦女能受惠。
tc.review: 籌款效益高，由義工幫忙以零成本公開募款。行政費用佔總支出14%，而項目費用和員工薪酬各佔總支出13%和70%，員工薪酬比例高，估計與專職輔導員、社工等前綫員工，及規模小有關。每年服務1500至2000名婦女。財政狀況健康，錄得少量盈餘，而存有的現金足夠作9個月的營運資金。審計報告清楚列明每個特別基金的財務狀況，值得嘉許。
tc.objective: 照顧婦女在情感及關係上遇上的危機，並提供專業服務
tc.advice: 分別列出項目前綫員工和行政部員工的薪酬，讓公眾了解項目真正需要的善款。增加公眾捐款佔總收入的比例，以便更多人認識，並擴張規模，令更多婦女能受惠。可考慮與本地其它慈善機構合作，擴闊網絡並接觸及幫多更多有需要的婦女。

en.name: Hong Kong Family Welfare Society
en.description:
To provide high quality and professional social service
Operating 60 service units
To provide a variety of service to family, children, youth, elderly and people with special needs
en.summary: Grant from the Government (~$200million) was the major source of income.  Operating income was the second major source of income.  Public donation contributed less than 0.2% of total income.  Project expense and administrative expense were about 10% and 10% of total expenditure.  Salaries expense was about 80% of total expenditure.  Salaries should have include frontline staffs.  It recorded a deficit amounted to $3million.  Cash and trust fund in hands were about $200million which can support operation for 10 months.  Operating ~60 service units serving family, children, youth, elderly and people with special needs.  Service statistics are available on the annual report.
en.review:
Grant from the Government (~$200million) was the major source of income
Operating income was the second major source of income
Public donation contributed less than 0.2% of total income
No rating is available because of no disclosure of fund raising expense
Project expense and administrative expense were about 10% and 10% of total expenditure
Salaries expense was about 80% of total expenditure
Salaries should have include frontline staffs, however, no estimation of salaries to be put under project expense can be made because of no disclosure of number of frontline staffs
Recorded a deficit amounted to $3million
Cash and trust fund in hands were about $200million which can support operation for 10 months
Operating ~60 service units serving family, children, youth, elderly and people with special needs
Service statistics including person time and satisfaction of each service unit were stated on the annual report
en.objective: To provide high quality and professional social service
en.advice:
To consider stating the fund raising expense and project staff costs, so that the public will understand the operating status better
To consider improving the financial deficit

tc.name: 香港家庭福利會
tc.description: 致力提供高質素的專業社會服務，營運60個服務單位，向家庭、兒童、青少年、長者、和有特別需要人士提供各式服務
tc.summary: 政府撥款(超過$2億)是主要收入來源，其次是營運收入，公眾捐款只佔總收入不足0.2%。項目費用和行政費用各佔總支出約10%。員工薪酬支出接近$2億，佔總支出約80%，估計當中大部分屬前綫服務員工。錄得約$300萬虧損，持有的現金和信託基金共約$2億，能支持約10個月營運。機構有約60個服務單位，向家庭、兒童、青少年、長者、和有特別需要人士提供服務。年報詳細顯示各服務單位的統計數據。
tc.review: 政府撥款(超過$2億)是主要收入來源，其次是營運收入，公眾捐款只佔總收入不足0.2%。由於沒有披露籌款成本，未能估算籌款效益，以致未能評級。項目費用和行政費用各佔總支出約10%。員工薪酬支出接近$2億，佔總支出約80%，估計當中大部分屬前綫服務員工。報告未有分別顯示前綫和支緩部員工的薪酬，亦沒披露員工人數，未能估算應撥入項目費用的員工薪酬。錄得約$300萬虧損，持有的現金和信託基金共約$2億，能支持約10個月營運。機構有約60個服務單位，向家庭、兒童、青少年、長者、和有特別需要人士提供服務。年報詳細顯示各服務單位的統計數據，包括服務人次、滿意度等等。
tc.objective: 致力提供高質素的專業社會服務
tc.advice:
可考慮列出籌款成本和項目員工薪酬，讓公眾更了解營運狀況
可考慮改善入不敷支情況

en.name: Make A Wish Foundation Hong Kong
en.description:
Member of “ International Wish Foundation” in United States 
To help children suffering from serious illness in Hong Kong and Macau fulfill their wishes  
To create wonderful memories for them through the "wish fulfillment” experience  
To make them feel there is hope, perseverance and joy in life  
Cases showed that children will be happier upon completion of aspiration, and will actively overcome difficulties and conquer diseases  
There are 31 offices globally
en.summary: Impressive fund-raising efficiency, but the charity did not make good use of donations fully. Project expense to total expenditure had a relatively low ratio.Surplus was over HK$5 million. Cash in hand was more than HK$1.2million, which was sufficient for next 5 years operation.We recommend the charity to consider widening the scope of service from children with serious illness to the poor children, or even poor adults.The management may also consider investing in low risk financial products against inflation.
en.review:
Good fund-raising efficiency (cost HK$16 for raising every HK 100) 
Fund-raising was 20% of total expenditure 
Staff salaries and project expenses were 22% and 51% of total expenditure 
Fulfilled the wishes of 73 children in 2009  
Held gathering party for children who received assistance in the past 
Recorded $3.13 million and $1.5 million of surplus in 2008 and 2009 respectively 
By end of 2009, held $12 million in cash which can support operations for the next 5 years 
Did not make good use of donations promptly, or good investment management
en.objective: To help children suffering from serious illness in Hong Kong and Macau make their dreams come true
en.advice:
To consider to extend services to non-seriously ill children, such as poor family children, or sick teenagers over age of 18. 
To consider using some cash for low risk investments to resist inflation

tc.name: 願望成真基金 (香港)
tc.description: 美國的「國際願望成真基金」的會員，致力幫助香港及澳門患有重病的兒童達成願望，希望透過「願望成真」的體驗，為他們創造一段美妙的回憶，令他們感到人生充滿希望、毅力及歡樂。不少事例證明，小朋友在完成心願後都會比較之前開朗，並會積極地克服困難，戰勝病魔。現時全球有31個國家或地區設有辦事處。
tc.summary: 籌款效益不俗，但未有善用捐款，項目費用占總支出的比例偏低。2008及2009年的盈餘共超過HK＄500萬，而持有的現金超過HK＄1200萬，足夠支持5年的營運。建議擴闊服務對象，為非患重病的兒童，例如家貧的兒童，又或是患病的成年人達成願望，令更多人受惠。另外，應考慮將部份現金作定期存款或投資，抵抗通脹，妥善理財。
tc.review: 籌款效益不俗，每HK$100的籌款成本為HK$16。可是籌款費用佔總支出20%，員工薪酬又佔約22%，而項目費用只佔總支出51%，各指標都屬較低水平。2009年為73名兒童達成願望，另設有聯歡會聚集過往受助兒童。2008和2009分別錄得313萬和150萬的盈餘。截至2009年底持有1200萬的現金，足夠支持基金未來5年的營運，反映機構未能快速善用捐款，或妥善投資管理。
tc.objective: 致力幫助香港及澳門患有重病的兒童達成願望
tc.advice: 擴展服務至非患重病兒童，例如家貧學童，又或是18歲以上的患病青年，令更多人受惠，使他們的人生重燃希望。另外，可考慮將部份現金作定期存款或投資，以抵抗通脹，妥善管理善款。

tc.name: 香港保護兒童會
tc.description: 致力與社會攜手向兒童及其家庭提供照顧、關懷及教育服務，促進兒童身心健康發展。保護及倡導兒童的福祉。 轄下共有27個服務單位，包括: 日託嬰兒園 (初生至未滿2歲幼兒) ， 幼兒學校 (2歲至6歲幼兒) ，「童樂居」 (初生至3歲幼兒)，兒童及家庭服務中心(九龍城)， 兒童及家庭服務中心(砵蘭街)，課餘託管中心 (升小一至小六學生)， 資訊科技教育中心。

tc.objective: 致力與社會攜手向兒童及其家庭提供照顧、關懷及教育服務，促進兒童身心健康發展。
tc.advice: 公開賬目，讓公眾更了解機構的營運和需要

en.name: Benji's Centre
en.description:
To provide professional speech therapy to children
Services include speech evaluation, speech therapy training and services, and provide consultation and supporting service to child care center, schools or relevant organization
Range of treatment includes developmental delay, speech delay, Oro-Motor difficulty, social disability, and hearing disability etc.  
Allotting 70% of the services to help families in financial difficulties
en.summary: Major source of income was donation.  Cost of raising every $100 was about $24 and fund raising cost was about 11% of total expenditure.  Project expense, salaries and administrative expense were about 63%, 14% and 4% of total expenditure.  More than 70% were speech therapist and social worker.  Low administrative expense reflecting good control.  It recorded a surplus and cash in hand can support about 7 months of operation. en.objective: To provide professional speech therapy to children
en.advice:

To consider expand the service so that more people can benefit from the services

tc.name: 庭恩兒童中心
tc.description: 為有需要的兒童提供言語治療，服務包括言語評估、言語治療訓練和服務，亦為學校、幼兒中心等有關機構提供顧問和支援服務。治療範圍包括言語發展障礙、發音障礙、社交障礙、聽覺障礙等。七成服務配額給有財政困難的家庭。
tc.summary: 主要收入來源是捐款。平均每籌$100的成本為$25，籌款成本佔總支出約11%。項目費用、員工薪酬和行政費用佔總支出63%，14%和4%。網站顯示中心員工的職位和人數，超過7成屬言語治療師和社工。行政費用佔比低，顯示有效控制成本。錄得盈餘，持有的現金約足夠7個月營運。服務包括言語治療和訓練，另會舉辦講座，學額超過200個。
